0.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a bowl, cream together softened butter, brown sugar, and white sugar.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in vanilla extract.
Combine flour, baking soda, and salt. Gradually add to the wet ingredients.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until edges are golden brown.
Allow cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring to a wire rack.

1.name: Vegetarian Stir-Fry
instructions: In a wok, heat sesame oil over medium-high heat.
Add minced ginger and garlic, sauté until fragrant.
Add cubed tofu and stir-fry until golden brown.
Add broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers. Cook until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Pour soy sauce over the stir-fry and toss to combine.
Serve over cooked rice.
